chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
items.plainText: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.

items.text: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
items.plainText: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;

items.text: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
items.plainText: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.

items.text: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
items.plainText: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.

items.text: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
items.plainText: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.

items.text: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
items.plainText: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.

items.text: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
items.plainText: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.

items.text: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
items.plainText: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.

items.text: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
items.plainText: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.

items.text: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
items.plainText: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.

items.text: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
items.plainText: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
